description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database viewer interface. It defines the structure, styles, and client-side scripting to browse and visualize database tables and data dynamically.
external_files: CSS styles embedded within the <style> tag

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates the HTML for the data table display.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on the value type, including expandable content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing cells with large or object content.
